data.text: @KDclouded @laloalcaraz @Variety Agreed...they had a far better chance  of reaching a larger audience with Scarlett than they will with an unknown trans actor.

@laloalcaraz @Variety Great news? The message being conveyed by the film would reach a far larger audience headlined by Scarlett for one, for two now it will be easier for people to justify giving even less trans actors roles for cis characters. Can’t have it both ways.
